title: Jeb：MCPE 0.9 IOS 版已经上传完毕
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kaho 于 2014-7-5 09:27 编辑 





@jeb_
Minecraft: Pocket Edition 0.9.0 has been uploaded to Apple by @jbernhardsson and @_tomcc:D Happy happy, joy joy!
Minecraft: Pocket Edition 0.9.0（MCPE 0.9）已经由 @jbernhardsson 和 @_tomcc 上传至苹果市场 :D 开心！喜悦！


有关发布日期尚未公布！
